description.en: One of the most important vratams, alongside Krishnajanmashtami, Shivaratri etc. Must observe fast. Offer Arghyam facing South, using Curd, Akshata, Water and Flowers (`dadhnAkSatOdakaiH puSpaiH`) chanting the shloka below.

shlokas: asyAM hi zrIH samAyuktaH yasmAt skandO.bhavat pura. tasmATSaSThyAM na bhuJjIta prApnuyAdbhArgavI sadA..
saptarSidAraja skanda sEnAdhipa mahAbala. rudrOmAgnija SaDvaktra gaGgAgarbha namO'stu tE..
